dict.acceptation: 进步；前进；[生物学]进化；（向更高方向）增长；

sent.orig: Socialist economy system is human society progress up to now most socioeconomic system of progress.
sent.trans: 社会主义经济制度是人类社会发展迄今为止最进步的社会经济制度。

sent.orig: Women provide great momentum for human progress, and without their participation, true progress is not possible.
sent.trans: 妇女是人类发展中的一支伟大力量，没有妇女的参与，发展是不可能取得成功的。

sent.orig: PROJECT PROGRESS: The study has been finished. preparatory work is in progress smoothly.
sent.trans: 项目进展情况：完成可研报告编制，其它前期工作进展顺利。

sent.orig: Scientific progress needs to be hitched to what you might call "moral progress"
sent.trans: 科学的进步需要紧跟“道德的进步”

sent.orig: We are in progress, others are progress, the team will need time to grow.
sent.trans: 我们在进步，别人也在进步，球队的成长需要时间。
